question.content: How were they managing the school for one yearwithout a Principal?

options.text: How was the Principal managed for one year without a School?
How was the school managed for one year without a Principal?
How was the Principal being managed for one year without a School?
How was the school being managed for one year without a Principal?

answer: How was the school being managed for one year without a Principal?

solution.content:
How was the school being managed for one year
without a Principal? (Correct)
(a) How was the Principal managed for one year without a
School? (Incorrect subject and object)
(b) How was the school managed for one year without a
Principal? (Being is missing before managed)
(c)HowwasthePrincipalbeingmanagedforoneyearwithouta
School? (Incorrect  subject and object)
